source.4902751e:
i_count = 2000
for x_indexing in YEAR_LIST:
    print(str(i_count) + " " + " FRP MEAN")
    YEAR_INDEX_LIST.append(i_count)
    print("---"*10)
    print("\n")
    print(x_indexing["frp"].mean())
    print("---"*20)
    print("\n")
    FRP_MEAN_LIST.append(x_indexing["frp"].mean())
    i_count += 1

source.9ae1328a:
YEAR_INDEX_LIST = pd.Series(YEAR_INDEX_LIST,name="YEAR")
FRP_MEAN_LIST = pd.Series(FRP_MEAN_LIST,name="FRP_MEAN")
BRIGHTNESS_MEAN_LIST = pd.Series(BRIGHTNESS_MEAN_LIST,name="BRIGHTNESS_MEAN")
BRIGHT_T31_MEAN_LIST = pd.Series(BRIGHT_T31_MEAN_LIST,name="KELVIN_MEAN")


FRP_MAX_LIST = pd.Series(FRP_MAX_LIST,name="FRP_MAX")
BRIGHTNESS_MAX_LIST = pd.Series(BRIGHTNESS_MAX_LIST,name="BRIGHTNESS_MAX")
KELVIN_MAX_LIST = pd.Series(KELVIN_MAX_LIST,name="KELVIN_MAX")
source.0d9a5159:
READING_TURKEY_CSV = pd.read_csv("../input/20002021-turkey-fire-points-single-csv-nasa/2000-2021 SINGLE TURKEY FIRE_M-C61_214067.csv",low_memory=False)

READING_TURKEY_CSV.fillna(0,inplace=True)

ZERO_TURKEY = READING_TURKEY_CSV[READING_TURKEY_CSV["type"] == 0]

ZERO_TURKEY.sort_values(by=["acq_date"],inplace=True)
ZERO_TURKEY.reset_index(drop=True,inplace=True)

ZERO_TURKEY

TURKEY_2021 = ZERO_TURKEY[-6228:-1]

TURKEY_2021.sort_values(by=["acq_date"],inplace=True)
TURKEY_2021.reset_index(drop=True,inplace=True)

TURKEY_2021
